Subject: Re: Introducing Redhot (New character)

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Beachcomber gently laid Redhot's head to the ground. He thought to
himself for a second. He didnt have quite the expertise of Ratchet, or
Hoist. But he was better at this than he was at fighting. He opened his
chest compartment, and ordered his computer to convert some of his own
energon into a cube. He then placed it into Redhot's hand, hoping it
would be enough for now. He then activated his geological equipment, and
monitered Redhot's head, for anything unusual, magnetic interferance,
mocrobes, etc.
